name: mcm
description: Automatically start up and shut down a minecraft server.

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.build-js: browserify client/index.js -t cssify -t babelify | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > client/build.js
scripts.dev: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css & DEBUG='mcm:*' npm run server
scripts.start: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm run server
scripts.watch-css: watch-run -ip 'client/style.css' -- autoprefixer client/style.css -mo client/build.css & browser-sync start --files='client/build.css' --no-ui --logLevel=silent

author: Chris Jaure <chrisjaure@gmail.com>
